add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for GET /api/v1/cart to retrieve cart contents, individual subtotals, and cart total. LLD only describes repository/service methods, not RESTful API contract.
add.reason: Story acceptance criteria requires a RESTful API for cart retrieval, but LLD omits explicit API contract and response structure.

add.description: Missing UI redirection logic for empty cart state ('continue shopping' link). LLD describes backend logic but omits frontend workflow for empty cart.
add.reason: Story specifies UI behavior for empty cart, but LLD does not address this requirement.

add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for PUT /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to update item quantity. LLD describes repository/service methods but omits RESTful API contract.
add.reason: Story acceptance criteria requires a RESTful API for updating cart item quantity, but LLD omits explicit API contract and request/response structure.

add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for DELETE /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to remove item from cart. LLD describes repository/service methods but omits RESTful API contract.
add.reason: Story acceptance criteria requires a RESTful API for removing cart items, but LLD omits explicit API contract and request/response structure.

modify.current_state: CartService.addItem validates product availability and adds item, but does not enforce default quantity of 1 when quantity is not specified.
modify.required_change: Enforce default quantity of 1 when adding a product to cart if quantity is not provided.
modify.reason: Story specifies default quantity of 1 for add-to-cart operation, but LLD does not enforce this rule.

modify.current_state: CartService.calculateTotals recalculates subtotal and total, but does not explicitly mention recalculation upon quantity mutation.
modify.required_change: Document that subtotal and total are recalculated automatically whenever item quantity is updated.
modify.reason: Story requires automatic recalculation of cart totals upon quantity mutation, but LLD does not explicitly state this behavior.
